fields.headline: Travel tip
fields.bodyText: Take a couple of small plastic "coin-bags" with you on every trip (available from any high street bank/building society) They are an essential all-round item, extremely durable and weighing next to nothing. I have used them to carry soap, bus tickets, trip mementoes, spectacles screws, food, receipts, stamps, stones and driftwood from beaches, foreign coins, and the inevitable loose sterling one always has just prior to departure. Michael Balmond
